xmlText.p: First Period_1, Dallas, Seguin 35 (Radulov, Klingberg), 4:36 (pp). Penalties_Burrows, OTT, (holding), 3:14.

Second Period_2, Ottawa, Hoffman 19 (Duchene, Stone), 19:58 (pp). Penalties_Karlsson, OTT, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 10:14; Pateryn, DAL, (holding), 15:22; Hoffman, OTT, (interference), 15:54; Shore, DAL, (high sticking), 18:35.
Third Period_3, Ottawa, Duchene 19 (Borowiecki, Karlsson), 6:36. 4, Dallas, Seguin 36 (Hamhuis, Janmark), 18:52. Penalties_Hoffman, OTT, (delay of game), 9:10.
Goalies_Ottawa, Anderson 19-20-5 (33 shots-31 saves). Dallas, Bishop 26-17-4 (12-12), Lehtonen 11-6-2 (18-15).
